text: Your ride is scheduled for pickup between $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "pickupTime"), "h:mm a") and $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "pickupTimeMax"), "h:mm a"), going from $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "pickupLocation") to $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "dropoffLocation") with an estimated drop off time between $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "dropoffTime"), "h:mm a") and $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "dropoffTimeMax"), "h:mm a"). Your driver $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "driverName") is on time and will arrive in a $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "driverVehicle").

outputAudioText.ssml:
<speak>
Your ride is scheduled for pickup between $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "pickupTime"), "h:mm a") and $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "pickupTimeMax"), "h:mm a"), going from $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "pickupLocation") to $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "dropoffLocation") with an estimated drop off time between $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "dropoffTime"), "h:mm a") and $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "dropoffTimeMax"), "h:mm a"). Your driver $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "driverName") is on time and will arrive in a $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "driverVehicle").
</speak>
